titles.title: Awake My Soul (jumps around but ok)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Awake my soul and with the sun Your daily stage of duty run Shake off dull sloth and joyful rise To pay thy morning sacrifice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shine on me Lord new life impart Fresh ardors kindle in my heart One ray of Thine all-quickening light Dispels the clouds and dark of night{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I my vows to You renew Disperse my sins as morning dew Guard my first springs of thought and will And with Yourself my spirit fill{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Direct control suggest this day All I design or do or say That all my powers with all their might In Your sole glory may unity{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise God from whom all blessing flow Praise Him all creatures here below Praise Him above O heavenly host Praise Father Son and Holy Ghost{/lang-eng}
